Pittsburgh.Art Institute of Pittsburgh:
The Art Institute of Pittsburgh (AIP) is a nonprofit institution owned and operated by Dream Center Education Holdings (DCEH), LLC located in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, United States, that emphasizes design education and career preparation for the creative job market. It was founded in 1921.
According to the National Center for Education Statistics, the Art Institute of Pittsburgh has a 32% graduation rate and a 20% student loan default rate.
